printed_text:
Draft format only.
You can use agendas from all factions in this deck.
stripped_printed_text: Draft format only. You can use agendas from all factions in this deck.

printed_text:
Draft format only.
You must maintain the order of your heap.
Whenever you trash a Corp card, if you have more {anarch} cards installed than any other faction, shuffle the top card of your heap into your stack.
stripped_printed_text: Draft format only. You must maintain the order of your heap. Whenever you trash a Corp card, if you have more {anarch} cards installed than any other faction, shuffle the top card of your heap into your stack.

printed_text:
Draft format only.
If you have more [criminal] cards installed than any other faction, when your turn begins, remove 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Draft format only. If you have more criminal cards installed than any other faction, when your turn begins, remove 1 tag.

printed_text:
Draft format only.
If you have more [shaper] cards installed than any other faction, when you install a card the first time each turn, draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: Draft format only. If you have more shaper cards installed than any other faction, when you install a card the first time each turn, draw 1 card.

printed_text:
Draft format only.
If you have more [haas-bioroid] cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn ends, shuffle 1 card in Archives into R&D.
stripped_printed_text: Draft format only. If you have more haas-bioroid cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn ends, shuffle 1 card in Archives into R&D.

printed_text:
Draft format only.
If you have more [jinteki] cards rezzed than any other faction, when your turn begins, you may swap 2 pieces of installed ice.
stripped_printed_text: Draft format only. If you have more jinteki cards rezzed than any other faction, when your turn begins, you may swap 2 pieces of installed ice.

printed_text:
Draft format only.
If you have more [nbn] cards rezzed than any other faction, whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, give the runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Draft format only. If you have more nbn cards rezzed than any other faction, whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, give the runner 1 tag.

printed_text:
Draft format only.
If you have more [weyland-consortium] cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn begins, place an advancement token on a piece of ice.
stripped_printed_text: Draft format only. If you have more weyland-consortium cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn begins, place an advancement token on a piece of ice.
